DOC.brief_summary: There are few treatments for central fever (fever that is due to the central nervous system, as opposed to an infectious source). We hypothesize that an externally applied cooling blanket will reduce temperature in neurologically ill patients with central fever.
DOC.brief_title: Temperature Control in Central Fever in the Neuro-ICU
